H0.text: Coloration is an example of a life process.

H1.text: Camouflage is an example of a life process.

H2.text: Migration is an example of a life process.

H3.text: Reproduction is an example of a life process.

A4.text: Reproduction (or procreation or breeding) is the biological process by which new individual organisms – 'offspring' – are produced from their 'parent' or parents.

A5.text: Sexual reproduction is a biological process that creates a new organism by combining the genetic material of two organisms in a process that starts with meiosis, a specialized type of cell division.
